entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get rid of the "untriaged" auto-label on Github issues #47844
  • Verify DAC signing works in preview VMR branches #47842
  • SDK ZIP does not include all AppHost packs #47841
  • "dotnet restore" fails if the project path contains a bracket #47832

Closed

  • Comparing symbols using only one set of references can result in false differences due inconsistent compare strings #46834
  • Revise exit codes for `dotnet test` #47550
    10.0.1xx
  • Compile native AOT library for Android in NET 9.0 #47801

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove nuget-client from non-SB VMR #47846
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [StaticWebAssets] Right size arrays #47843
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Linux-Bionic should build like Android, no rootfs #47739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimized JSON serialization logic #47838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update winforms cloaking paths #47839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update exit code logic for dotnet test #47836
    Area-dotnet test
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Allow winforms binaries in the VMR #47793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [10.0.1xx-preview3] Update winforms cloaking paths #47837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #47831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up #nullable disable from test directory #47686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update message for issues labeled as breaking-change #47812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update message for PRs labeled as breaking-change #47798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Try NetCore-Public-Test #47773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800
    Area-CLI
  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Open Test1.cs in Visual Studio, not MSTestSettings.cs #47768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format
